name: Gods of Egypt: The Battle for Eternity: Stunts
detailed_description: One of the most thrilling aspects of Gods Of Egypt is the barred action involving the clashing gods. Stunt Coordinator Glenn Boswell and Fight Choreographer Tim Wong worked with the actors and their stunt doubles in executing the combat.
